title: Handle Order Cancellation After Shipping
description: A customer calls to cancel an order, but it has already been shipped.

tasks.description: Identify the order and check its status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the order has already been shipped and provides the tracking number.

tasks.description: Inform the customer that the order cannot be cancelled but they can return it for a refund once it arrives.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the return process.

tasks.description: Create an RMA for the customer in advance so they can easily process the return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proactively creates the RMA for the customer.
